page.title: 12SHOPPING IN WHEATHAMPSTEAD
page.content: One day after school we went down the village to ask some questions.We first went in a shop called Fine Fare and we asked the manager some questions.We were in there for about 15 minutes. Then we went in the Chemist.The Chemist is a shop that sells hair clips,baby stuff,medicines and other things .It is a very busy shop. Then we walked out of the Chemist and into the Newsagents.Linda introduced us and we asked questions.That shop is quite small really but it is nice inside.They sell sweets, magazines,pens,papers,cards and lots of other things. We walked up the street a little bit and went into the old hairdressers.The lady said the dearest haircut was Â£30.00 and that was a perm.We were quite amazed because the Hairdressers only had two hair mousses.{
